attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Action not words. I have ,for more than 50 years, voted Labour.The above have bought disgrace on our party . Leadership requires action now.

rejection.details: As a Government website, we cannot publish party political material (eg references to Labour). More guidance can be found in the terms and conditions: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms
